main event: Colonel submitted a report to the USAF about observing a disc-shaped object with lights hovering over a house near Falls Church, VA in 1952.
interesting points: The object hovered for about 20 to 25 minutes at an altitude of 40 feet,The object was described as disc-shaped with lights that changed color from red to green,Multiple neighbors observed the object during the sighting,The sighting included three additional lights traveling in a definite pattern,The report noted irregular sputtering sounds different from usual aircraft during the observation.
sighted object: disc-shaped object with lights changing color
